---

title: My leaders
sidebar_label: My leaders
description: /futures/user/v1/copy-trade/follower-leaders-page
---

## 接口

**GET** `/futures/user/v1/copy-trade/follower-leaders-page`

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `type` | number | 是 |  | Query type. 1：current Follow,2：historical follow |  |
| `id` | number | 否 |  | page id |  |
| `direction` | String | 是 | NEXT | page direction | NEXT/PREV |
| `limit` | number | 是 | 10 | page size |  |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String myLeadersGet(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": false, //prev
    "hasNext": false, //next
    "items": [
      {
        "accountId": 0,
        "avatar": "",
        "cancel": false,
        "followMarginU": 0,
        "followProfitU": 0,
        "id": 0,
        "leaderName": "",
        "level": 0,
        "levelName": ""
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
